articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Heads of State
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Heads of State
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday separately met and had friendly talks with foreign heads of state who took part in the inaugural ceremony of the president of Equatorial Guinea. They included Idriss Deby Itno, president of Chad, Ali Bongo Ondimba, president of Gabon, Faustin Archange Touadera, president of Central Africa, Denis Sassou-Nguesso, president of Congo, Alpha Conde, president of Guinea, and Ibrahim Boubacar Keita, president of Mali.
					 Kim Yong Nam conveyed greetings sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the heads of states concerned.
					
					 They warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and the successful holding of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam Thursday met Mahamadou Issoufou, president of Niger, Therence Sinunguruza, first vice-president of Burundi, and Joaquim Alberto Chissano, former president of Mozambique.

articles.title: Funeral of Kang Sok Ju Held
articles.content:
Funeral of Kang Sok Ju Held
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A state funeral of Kang Sok Ju, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, took place here on Sunday.
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other members of the state funeral committee and bereaved family members of the deceased.
					
					 Bereaved family members and members of the state funeral committee observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased before his coffin was carried out of the Sojang Club.
					
					 The hearse left for the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri.
					
					 Pyongyangites bid last farewell to Kang Sok Ju in profound grief.
					
					 The hearse arrived at the cemetery.
					
					 A ceremony of bidding farewell to the deceased took place.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, said in a eulogy that the death of Kang Sok Ju, genuine revolutionary and able political activist, was a great loss to the WPK and the people.
					
					 Though his heart stopped beating, the feats he performed for the party, the revolution, the country and its people will last forever, the eulogist stressed.
					
					 The remains of the deceased were buried and bereaved family members and members of the state funeral committee spread earth on the grave.
					
					 Placed before the grave was a wreath bearing the august name of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the names of the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 All the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.

articles.title: Director of CPRK Secretariat Calls for Opening Broad Avenue to National Reunification and Prosperity
articles.content:
Director of CPRK Secretariat Calls for Opening Broad Avenue to National Reunification and Prosperity
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Won Tong Yon, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK), issued a statement on Sunday, stressing that the line and policy for national reunification, set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, are a product from his noble moral obligation and historic mission to bring the reunified country to the fellow countrymen. The line and policy serve as an eternal inspiring banner in the struggle to pull down the barriers of national division and open a broad avenue to the reunification of the country, it added.
					 If all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas turn out in a nationwide patriotic movement for reunification, upholding the said line and policy, the extremely deteriorated north-south relations will be improved and a broad avenue to independent reunification opened, greatly contributing to peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Dialogue and negotiations are a basic way for mending the bedeviled north-south relations and reunifying the country peacefully in conformity with the desire and will of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 For the present, it is necessary to have dialogue and negotiations between the north-south military authorities as soon as possible.
					
					 The north and the south should take a substantial step to defuse the military tension and danger of conflict in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and hot spot in the west sea and expand its sphere as the climate of military trust is created.
					
					 It is more important to maintain at north-south dialogue the position and stand of respecting and constantly implementing the agreements common to the nation.
					
					 If the north-south agreements are nullified according to the change in situation and regime, any agreement to be reached between the two sides through dialogue will be of no use.
					
					 The north and the south should respect and implement the historic agreements made before the nation and the world, including the three principles for national reunification and the north-south joint declarations, no matter how the situation and climate may change.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly have a willingness to improve the north-south relations, they should abandon the conception of confrontation with their fellow countrymen aimed at "change" or "collapse of system", turn to the stand for national harmony and reunification to create a climate for north-south dialogue and immediately come out for dialogue and negotiations in response to our patriotic appeal.

articles.title: DPRK Sends Letter of Protest to Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
DPRK Sends Letter of Protest to Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Emergency Measure Committee for Rescuing Abductees sent a letter of protest to Park Geun Hye on Sunday as regards the south Korean side's continued detention of DPRK citizens who were abducted in group.
					 As already known, the Intelligence Service of south Korea allured and took away to south Korea women citizens of the DPRK in group on April 5, who were running a restaurant in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province of China.
					
					 The letter said that the abduction of those citizens conducting legitimate business activities overseas is a violation of the DPRK's sovereignty and a heinous politically-motivated provocation to its ideology and system.
					
					 Branding the case as a hideous, premeditated and organized international terrorism committed under intervention of the south Korean authorities from A to Z, it said:
					
					 It is the unanimous view of people at home and abroad that such "defection", made in few hours via third country, would have been impossible without direct involvement and control of the authorities.
					
					 Your side has kept each of our citizens in a solitary cell, completely isolating them from the outside world and gagging the press. It is another proof that the recent case was committed in an organized way under the direction of the authorities.
					
					 Your side's group abduction is an unethical act of destroying the harmonious families and ruthlessly violating human rights.
					
					 More than 40 days has passed since the DPRK girls were abducted and taken away to south Korea.
					
					 Our side had already and strongly demanded through several channels that your side make an apology for the group abduction and unconditionally return our citizens and inflict a severe punishment on those involved in the abduction case or hand them over to the DPRK's court.
					
					 We had also repeatedly urged your side to take a prompt working step so that the abductees' parents can go to Seoul through Panmunjom and meet their children face to face, as desired by them.
					
					 But, your side has persistently refused to accept our just demands under such shameful sophism as "free will" and "reflection of yearning".
					
					 We again and strongly urge your side to apologize for the unprecedented group abduction, return our citizens without delay and condition and severely punish or hand over to our legal institution those involved in the case and its wire-pullers.
					
					 Your side should also clearly assure us and the international community that such abduction will never be repeated.
					
					 For the present, you should take a practical measure at once so as to enable parents of the abductees to go to Seoul via Panmunjom and meet their children face to face and bring them back home.
					
					 The letter warned that if the south Korean side continues to deny the hideous crime and detain the abducted citizens of the DPRK for no reason, Park Geun Hye, the chief executive of south Korea, will be held wholly accountable for the grave consequence arising therefrom.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Renew Their Will to Attain Goal of Grain Production
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Renew Their Will to Attain Goal of Grain Production
 Sukchon, May 22 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea at the Yoldusamchon Farm in Sukchon County Sunday to make redoubled efforts to implement the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and attain the goal of grain production set by the party at any cost.
					 The participants heard the appeal to all the servicepersons, youths and other people made by the 7th Congress of the WPK calling for launching a Mallima speed campaign to win the complete victory of socialism.
					
					 The speakers called upon all the organizations of the union, agricultural workers and its members to turn out as one in the drive for fully implementing the important tasks set forth at the Party Congress.
					
					 The agricultural workers should bear deep in mind Kim Jong Il's patriotism with responsibility that they are standing on the first line trench of the first echelon in defending socialism and work hard to attain the goal of grain production set forth by the party at any cost, they said.
					
					 They stressed the need for all the agricultural workers to radically increase the agricultural production true to the main spirit of the Party Congress and successfully realize the great idea and intention of the party to make the country sufficient in food in the near future.

articles.title: Struggle for National Reunification under Banner of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
articles.content:
Struggle for National Reunification under Banner of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Juche-based reunification line and policy call for opening a road to the reunification of Korea through maintenance of national independence, great national unity and peace and by means of federation while holding fast to the three charters for national reunification. They are the most reasonable and aboveboard milestone for reunification, as they reflect the will and demands of all Koreans and the specific conditions of the country, and an important programme ensuring a rosy future of the nation and indicating a shortcut to building a reunified powerful nation.
					 Kim Wan Su, chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, stressed this in a statement on Sunday.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 In his historic report at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, respected Marshal Kim Jong Un recalled that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il advanced the outstanding ideas and lines of independent reunification and fair proposals to reunify the country in the period under review and laid firm foundations for its independent reunification and peaceful prosperity. And he expressed his unshakable faith and will to defend and add luster to the great leaders' immortal exploits and surely achieve the national historic cause of reunifying the country true to their lifelong intention and behests.
					
					 To respect and honestly implement the north-south joint declaration is a prerequisite to developing the north-south relations and bringing earlier the national reunification. There is nothing to fear in the world and nothing impossible to do when the north and the south pool their will and efforts.
					
					 With confidence in victory and optimism, all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad will turn out in the patriotic reunification struggle to implement the three principles of national reunification and the north-south joint declarations and thus surely build a reunified powerful country, dignified, peaceful and prosperous.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Delegations of different countries and regions to take part in the 19th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday.
					 They laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: 53rd National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools Open
articles.content:
53rd National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools Open
 Kowon, May 22 (KCNA) -- The 53rd national games of juvenile sports schools opened with due ceremony in Kowon County on Sunday. They will be held in Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Sariwon, Wonsan, Hamhung and Nampho cities, Kowon and other places.
					 The participants will compete in more than 10 events including football, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, tennis and judo. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials concerned, players and school youth and children in Kowon County.

articles.title: Sinhung Area Revolutionary Battle Site Draws Many Visitors
articles.content:
Sinhung Area Revolutionary Battle Site Draws Many Visitors
 Sinhung, May 22 (KCNA) -- It marks 15 years since leader Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Sinhung Area Revolutionary Battle Site.
					 It is a historic place to which President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk came several times, guided the work of small units and groups of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and its political operatives and aroused the people from all walks of life to the all-people resistance for national liberation during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the battle site on May 23, Juche 90 (2001), saying that it serves as a precious treasure of the Korean revolution and one of important educational bases to arm the party members and other people, service personnel and school youth and children with the revolutionary tradition of the party. He gave an important instruction to successfully manage and operate the revolutionary battle site and intensify education through this.
					
					 Over the past 15 years, a lot of people have visited the battle site. They included service personnel, officials and other people of industrial establishments and universities across the country including the Capital City Construction Commission, Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology, and school youth and children.
					
					 Through the visits, they realized that the revolutionary tradition of Mt. Paektu, immortal lifeline of the Korean revolution, is the historic roots of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution, its lineage and the banner of eternal victory of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Songun and Self-Development Serve as Source of DPRK's Strength: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun and Self-Development Serve as Source of DPRK's Strength: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Songun and self-development serve as the source of strength of the DPRK making a great leap forward and development despite the enemy's vicious military threat and harsh economic blockade, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Looking back on the past, the hostile forces have become all the more desperate in their moves for "sanctions" and military threat in a bid to arrest the advance of the DPRK toward the final victory. Joining in such moves, riff-raffs have worked hard to block the advance of the DPRK.
					
					 However, the DPRK has dynamically advanced to reach the eminence of final victory while resolutely smashing injustice with its transparent independent faith, revolutionary principle and the pluck and grit of Paektu.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' bombast that Korea could not rise up again even in a hundred years and the hostile forces' prediction that the DPRK would collapse in three days or three months, three years at the latest and their wild dream that the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts can never succeed have all gone bust.
					
					 No force on earth can match the DPRK, a country which knows no word "impossible" and possesses the tremendous strength called self-development.
					
					 The enemies are working hard to block the service personnel and people of the DPRK from dashing forward like the wind toward the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Their revolutionary will and mental power to defend socialism, their life and soul, at the cost of their blood and certainly build a socialist power by their own efforts are being given full play.
					
					 Everything is being done correctly according to the blueprint and timetable of the Workers' Party of Korea and we are sure to emerge victorious once again.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Hold Memorial Service for Kwangju Uprisers
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Hold Memorial Service for Kwangju Uprisers
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Chicago, U.S. held a memorial service on May 17, 36 years after the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 The participants honored the memory of the Kwangju uprisers who laid down their lives for independence and democracy against the fascist military dictatorship.
					
					 Then they watched the video dealing with the feats of the Kwangju uprisers and indiscriminate massacre against them 36 years ago.
					
					 They recalled that the noble spirit of the Kwangju uprisers had a great impact on the movement for democracy.
					
					 The participants called for bringing earlier the day of national reunification.

articles.title: Events Held at DPRK Missions Overseas to Celebrate Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Events Held at DPRK Missions Overseas to Celebrate Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Events took place at DPRK missions in different countries from May 12 to 17 to celebrate the successful Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 They included receptions and film shows at the DPRK missions in Equatorial Guinea, Nigeria, Hong Kong of China, Kuwait, Bulgaria and France, and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity."
					
					 The director of the Office of the General Secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK was a historic event of weighty significance in the struggle for carrying out the just cause of the WPK and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria praised Kim Jong Un as a great statesman and ever-victorious brilliant commander wisely guiding the Korean people's struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving socialist nation with his seasoned and tested leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association noted that the DPRK would build a thriving nation to be proud of in the world and win a sure victory in the fierce confrontation the U.S. imperialists as it has Kim Jong Un, creditable successor to the intention and cause of the preceding leaders, as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 The international secretary of the Radical Party of Left of France and the international secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League said the Seventh Congress of the WPK proved that it has a rosy future, expressing their will to intensify the movement for supporting the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Urge U.S. to Quit S. Korea
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Urge U.S. to Quit S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on May 14 on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 Recalling that people of Kwangju of south Korea rose up against the fascist colonial rule in May, 1980 and the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist junta brutally killed uprisers and innocent citizens under the backstage manipulation of the U.S., the statement said:
					
					 The bloody suppression of the Kwangju popular uprising was a massacre and this unethical crime was engineered by the U.S.
					
					 Though the uprising failed, it shook the U.S. imperialists' colonial rule and fascist dictatorship of south Korea to their very foundation.
					
					 It was a patriotic and democratic one against imperialism and fascism.
					
					 It kindled the torch of the protracted struggle of the south Koreans for democracy, independence and national reunification.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the pro-U.S. puppet clique of south Korea deserve international punishment for committing the Kwangju massacre.
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. imperialists to quit south Korea at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of Group of Citizens of DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Abduction of Group of Citizens of DPRK under Fire 
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Helmi El Hadidi, chairperson of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, made public a statement on May 16 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' group allurement and abduction of DPRK's citizens.
					 He said that the south Korean authorities let gangsters of the Intelligence Service lure and abduct a group of DPRK's citizens, adding that this was a flagrant infringement upon the DPRK's dignity and sovereignty, a grave political provocation inciting the confrontation and tension between the north and south and a hideous criminal act of mercilessly abusing human rights. He went on:
					
					 Right after the case occurred, the DPRK bitterly denounced this crime and strongly demanded the south Korean authorities unconditionally and immediately send back the abductees and allow their parents to meet their daughters face to face in Seoul.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities are repeating "voluntary defection," turning down the elementary humanitarian requests of the parents of the abductees and keeping them in solitary confinement to keep them away from any contact with outside.
					
					 Their inhuman behavior is the unethical criminal act of denying the most elementary right stipulated in the World Declaration on Human Rights and the relevant international conventions on human rights.
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization strongly urges the UN and the international human rights organizations to bear in mind how they deal with this case will be a touchstone discerning the truth about "protection and promotion of human rights" touted by them, to call into question the south Korean authorities' unethical crime and to take a relevant step to send the abductees of the DPRK back to the folds of their family members as soon as possible.

articles.title: Bulgarian Political Figure Hails Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Bulgarian Political Figure Hails Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, made public a statement "World looks up to socialist Korea as beacon of hope" on May 16 to hail the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said the former Soviet Union and east European socialist countries collapsed and hypocritical politicians took powers and took the lead in restoring capitalism.
					
					 The banner of socialism was lowered in Bulgaria, too, and it took the road of capitalism and could not but undergo a political upheaval, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 However, the DPRK has invariably upheld the banner of socialism and steadily advanced along the path of socialism with its own independent political line.
					
					 What I would like to emphasize in particular is that young leader Kim Jong Un is confidently advancing the building of a thriving socialist nation with nuclear treasured sword of justice despite all the moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK, true to the noble intention of the great leaders.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK was the historic event which demonstrated to the world the steadfast will of the WPK to accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution down through generations under the uplifted banner of socialism.

articles.title: Entidad de RPDC envia protesta a Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Entidad de RPDC envia protesta a Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Comite de Medidas Emergentes para Salvar a las Victimas del Secuestro Forzoso de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 22 una protesta escrita a Park Geun-hye en relacion con que el Sur de Corea sigue deteniendo a fuerzas a las ciudadanas secuestradas de la RPDC.
					Como ya esta conocido por todos, el pasado 5 de abril el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea rapto a plena luz a las ciudadanas de la RPDC que administraban un restaurante en Ningbo de la provincia de Zhejiang de China, y las llevo al Sur de Corea.
					
					Inicia asi el documento y prosigue:
					
					El presente secuestro deviene una innegable violacion a la soberania de la RPDC y una perversa provocacion politica contra la idea y el regimen de ella.
					
					Este caso constituye un terrorismo internacional de tamano especial, cometido de manera intencional y organiza, bajo la intervencion de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Esta "fuga desde el Norte de Corea (RPDC)", realizada en unas horas pasando por un tercer pais, no podria lograrse jamas sin intervencion directa de las autoridades, lo que es la unanime calificacion interna y externa.
					
					Vuestra parte encarcela a las secuestradas en las celdas apartandolas totalmente de la parte exterior y realiza la estricta prohibicion de informacion, lo que testimonia que el presente caso fue perpetrado organizadamente bajo el mando de las autoridades.
					
					El presente rapto colectivo de vuestra parte constituye el acto antietico y anti-DDHH que destruye y pisotea cruelmente las familias armoniosas.
					
					Ya pasaron mas de 40 dias desde cuando fueron arrastradas las ciudadanas de la RPDC a la parte surena.
					
					A traves de varias vias exigimos fuertemente a vuestra parte pedir disculpa por su crimen, devolver incondicionalmente a nuestras ciudadanas y sentenciar severamente a los complices o entregarlos a nuestro tribunal.
					
					Y demandamos reiteradamente tomar las medidas inmediatas  de trabajo para que las familias de las danadas salgan segun sus deseos a Seul por via Phanmunjom a fin de reunirse con sus hijas.
					
					Pero, vuestra parte niega obstinadamente nuestras exigencias justas presentando las sofisterias descaradas tales como "volunta libre" y "reflejo de simpatia".
					
					Volvemos a demandar fuertemente a vuestra parte pedir disculpa por su crimen de secuestro inaudito, devolver inmediata e incondicionalmente a nuestras ciudadanas y sentenciar severamente a los complices y manipuladores por detras o entregarlos a nuestro organo judicial.
					
					Tambien, vuestra parte debe confirmar seriamente ante la RPDC y la sociedad internacional la no repeticion de los actos de tentacion y rapto.
					
					Ante todo, tiene que tomar de inmediato las medidas de trabajo para que los padres de las victimas salgan a Seul por via Phanmunjom para reunirse con sus hijas y regresar junto con ellas.
					
					Si la parte surena sigue negando como ahora a su crimen y detiene injustamente a nuestras ciudadanas, la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye se responsabilizara de todas las consecuencias que se emanaran de ello.

articles.title: Direccion Nortena de Jonminthukwi condena preparativos de guerra bioquimica de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Direccion Nortena de Jonminthukwi condena preparativos de guerra bioquimica de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ACNC) -- Recientemente se ha revelado el hecho de que Estados Unidos desarrolla el ensayo de virus Zika en la base militar norteamericana en Ryongsan del Sur de Corea, lo cual causa gran indignacion de todos los estratos surcoreanos.
					Al mismo tiempo, se dio a conocer que el Departamento de Defensa definio el muelle 8 del puerto de Pusan como centro de reserva para la aplicacion del "plan Jupiter" destinado a elevar la capacidad de guerra bioquimica. En el Sur de Corea ya existen similares bases militares norteamericanas en Ryongsan de Seul, Osan de la provincia de Kyonggi y en Kunsan de la provincia de Jolla del Norte. Esta noticia desagradable provoca las protestas y condenas mas criticas de todos los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas intentan encubrir sus crimenes y evadir la condena de la opinion publica del interior y el exterior.
					
					El portavoz de la Direccion Nortena del Jonminthukwi (Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas) publico el dia 21 una declaracion senalando que con tales sofismas pueriles y cobardes, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas nunca pueden encubrir sus maniobras criminales, y condenando esa artimana de EE.UU. en nombre de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					El documento prosigue:
					
					Tambien en el ano pasado, EE.UU. introdujo los bacilos de antracosis vivientes en las bases militares norteamericanas del Sur de Corea y realizo la prueba de armas bacteriologicas. Y dijo descaradamente que "los introdujo solo una vez" y excuso como "error simple" aunque en realidad los habia introducido en 16 ocasiones.
					
					Para colmo de males, se ha revelado el hecho criminal de que el imperio norteamericano hizo los preparativos de guerra bacteriologica introduciendo en el Sur de Corea hasta la Yersinia Pestis (bacilo de peste) y la bacteria botulinus.
					
					Ya esta conocida la verdad de que despues de la guerra coreana, EE.UU. instalo en sus bases militares y otras localidades del Sur de Corea los institutos de bacterias de diferentes generos y trato a los habitantes surcoreanos como objeto de la prueba de armas biologicas que transmiten las enfermedades contagiosas de alta mortalidad.
					
					Todos los hechos testimonian claramente que los imperialistas norteamericanos son la pandilla de salvajes que convirtieron el Sur de Corea en el infierno para exterminar a la nacion coreana, y la horda de asesinos que se dedican con frenesi a los preparativos de guerra bioquimica sin hacer caso de la ley internacional.
					
					La tragedia esta en que el imperio continua cometiendo sin vacilacion tales pruebas antieticas solo en el Sur de Corea.
					
					La nacion coreana no puede vivir tranquila si deja a los asesinos norteamericanos, que trazan las artimanas para la guerra nuclear y la bioquimica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y a los traidores proyanquis que obedecen a ciegas a su amo gringo.
					
					Todos los habitantes surcoreanos deberan levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha por frustrar las maniobras criminales de los imperialistas yanquis y sus lacayos tendentes a convertir el sagrado territorio patrio en la ruina catastrofica de la guerra nuclear y la biologica.
					
					EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas deben reflexionar en serio sobre las consecuencias catastroficas que se emanen de sus imprudentes artimanas criminales y abolirlas de inmediato.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana frustrara categoricamente los preparativos de guerra bioquimica de los yanquis y sus lacayos.
